DOC.brief_summary: In the final months of pregnancy, women need to know whether their 'water is broken' necessitating a race to the delivery room, or whether pressure of the foetus on their bladder has caused them merely to pass urine. They may also have faced the same dilemma on many occasions much earlier in the pregnancy. With this development the investigators will provide them with an immediate answer to this critical question.
DOC.brief_title: Development of a Diagnostic Device for Identifying Between Amniotic Fluid to Urine
DOC.criteria: Amniotic fluid that were taken after the 17th week.
